sentences.en: A cork sealed the bottle wine cage prevented inadvertent opening of the container.
sentences.cn: 然后用软木塞密封瓶子,防止瓶子不注意地敞开在货柜上.

sentences.en: An inadvertent inquiry would have brought us into troubled waters.
sentences.cn: 一次调查不当心,就会使我们陷入混乱局面.

sentences.en: An instance of being inadvertent an oversight or a slip.
sentences.cn: 疏忽之处疏忽的情况;失察或失误.

sentences.en: And there's always the possibility that I could trigger an inadvertent disaster.
sentences.cn: 而且,我总是会不经意的引发一些灾难.

sentences.en: Dan's blunder was inadvertent and we forgave him.
sentences.cn: 丹犯错误不是有意的,我们原谅了他.

sentences.en: Engagement of the lock prevents inadvertent unclamping of the fuelling machine from the fuel channel.
sentences.cn: 该锁定装置的接合防止燃料填充机从燃料管道上意外松开.

sentences.en: I wish you may cherish the memory of me at the inadvertent certain moment.
sentences.cn: 但愿在某天的某个瞬间你能想起我.

sentences.en: Incoming non - conforming materials are segregated and separately identified to prevent inadvertent use.
sentences.cn: 进货中的不合格品须隔离并加上标识以防止进一步使用.

sentences.en: It resembled sedimentary rock with the occasional fossil of a long - lost feature or inadvertent vulnerability.
sentences.cn: 它看起来就像是沉积岩,夹杂着灭绝生物的化石和不为人所知的弱点.

sentences.en: No inadvertent respiratory placement of feeding tubes or perforation of the GI tract occurred.
sentences.cn: 无呼吸道内置管或消化道穿孔等并发症.

sentences.en: No, I believe it inadvertent . Let's play.
sentences.cn: 不, 我不认为是故意的, 继续比赛.

sentences.en: The government has said it was an inadvertent error.
sentences.cn: 政府声称那是无意的过失。

sentences.en: The suffering is inadvertent and unwanted.
sentences.cn: 这种受苦并非故意,也无必要.

sentences.en: Unfortunately , I made an inadvertent remark about Irma's failure while she was present.
sentences.cn: 甚为不悦, 当着Irma的面我对她的错误说了一些不敬之话.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, I an inadvertent remark about Emma's failure while she was present.
sentences.cn: 埃玛在场时, 很不巧我冒失的提及他的失败.

words.tran_cn: 疏忽的；不注意的（副词inadvertently）；无意中做的

trans.tran_cn: 不经意的，出于无心的，疏忽的，漫不经心的，粗心大意
trans.tran_en: An inadvertent action is one that you do without realizing what you are doing
